content: I just saw on the Lobste.rs and HN front pages that the Roc compiler is going to be rewritten in Zig. I was surprised to see that because I hadn't seen it discussed on Zulip at all, I assume it's in a channel that I'm not subscribed to though, can anyone point me to it?
It was initially proposed by Richard in a video call during this meeting: #contributing > contributor coordination meeting - Feb 2024
It then Zuliped in a dozen threads in #compiler development
Ah, I'm not in compiler development, makes sense :sweat_smile:
Hannes has marked this topic as resolved.
